aboutMe.content: I'm a devoted JS/TS Developer striving for the upcoming technologies that help me ship quality software through engineering excellence to make the world a better place for everyone. I'm eager to learn & grow both as a person & as an effective team-player by writing efficient & optimized code which can scale to enterprise applications. I also focus on re-usability & try to automate stuff while working on similar tasks. I see nothing as impossible & will always find a solution or workaround to handle upcoming challenges, no matter how much difficult they might seem.

workExperiences.description: I'm currently in charge of developing an advanced trading platform & portfolio optimization dashboard (without any UI libs) while offering best utils & packages. I also mentor junior developers as well as collaborating with the UI/UX team for a high-quality & intuitive front-end web design.
workExperiences.challenges: I've built a highly re-usable, customizable & scalable stockTables component for tens of different pages using the BLOC pattern, MVVM & Bridge for API communication. I've also created an automation script for files creation which made development time saved for more productive tasks.
